metadata.title: CVE-2024-38391 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cxl/region: Fix cxlr_pmem leaksBefore this error path, cxlr_pmem pointed to a kzalloc() memory, freeit to avoid this memory leaking.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
